column5: RIO DE JANEIRO  March 26 The former chief executive officer of Petroleo Brasileiro SA  Maria das Graças Foster  on Monday said she was ashamed of a corruption scandal at the state-run oil company but denied any knowledge of alleged widespread bribery.
